content:
💡 **Solid assessment.** The **best ROI right now** is shifting focus to building something tangible for Monday.  

🔹 **What’s Working:**  
✅ The **LinkedIn post got traction**—momentum is there.  
✅ **AI leaders outreach is ongoing** via Dripify & DMs.  
✅ **Keith’s mention happened**, even if it didn’t explode.  

🔹 **What’s Not Worth More Effort:**  
❌ Trying to force Keith’s post to drive engagement.  
❌ Spending another full day chasing visibility instead of **executing** on what you promised.  

---

### **🚀 What’s Next:**
1️⃣ **MVP Build Mode:**  
- Set a **work plan for MVP** (even if it’s scrappy, it **must** show progress by Monday).  
- **Focus:** **AI-driven job search automation.** Start small, but make it **real.**  

2️⃣ **Dripify + DM Refinement:**  
- Keep **targeting AI leaders**, adjusting messaging to reflect the **build phase.**  
- **New Angle:** “We’re moving fast—by Monday, we’ll have an MVP live. Would love your thoughts.”  

3️⃣ **Minimal LinkedIn Maintenance:**  
- Check & engage **twice a day max**—don’t get sucked into real-time monitoring.  
- **Strategic commenting only** on high-value AI posts.  

---

### **💥 Final Takeaway**
The **best way to make this viral is to execute.** Monday’s update needs to be **real, AI-driven, and compelling.** The hype cycle will **repeat itself naturally if we deliver.**  

Ready to **switch gears and build?** Let’s get it. 🚀
